document.name: Group Administration Form

functionality.item: Collect group information via a form for further processing.
Use AJAX methods to allow for any action on a group (create, modify, search or delete).

document.assumptions: This page is served by a Web server and is URL addressable.
document.preconditions: Requests for modification or deletion require that a group already exist.
document.postconditions: A new group may be created upon creation request.
